com.ibm.team.build.common.buildengine
Class BuildEngineConfigurationRegistry

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.team.build.common.buildengine.BuildEngineConfigurationRegistry

public class BuildEngineConfigurationRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

Registry of available build engine configuration elements and engine templates. The available elements and templates are the ones contributed to the following extension points:

  • com.ibm.team.build.common.buildEngineConfigurationElements
  • com.ibm.team.build.common.buildEngineTemplates

Since:
0.8

getBuildEngineTemplates

public IBuildEngineTemplate[] getBuildEngineTemplates()
Get the build engine templates known to the registry.

Returns:
The templates. May be empty, but never null.

getBuildEngineTemplate

public IBuildEngineTemplate getBuildEngineTemplate(java.lang.String templateId)
Get the build engine template with id templateId.

Parameters:
templateId - The template id to look for.
Returns:
The template, or null if a template with the id doesn't exist.

getBuildEngineConfigurationElements

public IBuildConfigurationElement[] getBuildEngineConfigurationElements()
Get the build configuration elements known to the registry.

Returns:
The configuration elements. May be empty, but never null.

getBuildEngineConfigurationElement

public IBuildConfigurationElement getBuildEngineConfigurationElement(java.lang.String elementId)
Get the build engine configuration element with id elementId.

Parameters:
elementId - The element id to look for.
Returns:
The element, or null if an element with the id doesn't exist.
